mapper.sql: select project_id, project_name, customer_id, status, amount, pm_user_id, delivery_date, deal_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_project
select p.project_id, p.project_name, p.customer_id, p.status, p.amount, p.pm_user_id, p.delivery_date, p.deal_flag, p.del_flag, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') AS xaxis,SUM(totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project where deal_flag = 1 GROUP BY xaxis
SELECT CONCAT(YEAR(create_time) , '第',QUARTER(create_time),'季度' ) as xaxis, SUM(totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project where deal_flag = 1 GROUP BY YEAR(create_time),QUARTER(create_time)
SELECT YEAR(create_time) AS xaxis,SUM(totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project where deal_flag = 1 GROUP BY xaxis
SELECT c.customer_name as xaxis, SUM(p.totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project p LEFT JOIN sys_customer c ON p.customer_id=c.customer_id WHERE p.deal_flag=1 GROUP BY p.customer_id ORDER BY yaxis DESC

SELECT c.customer_name as xaxis, SUM(p.totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project p LEFT JOIN sys_customer c ON p.customer_id=c.customer_id WHERE p.deal_flag=1 AND YEAR(p.create_time) = YEAR(NOW())-1 GROUP BY p.customer_id ORDER BY yaxis DESC

SELECT c.customer_name as xaxis, SUM(p.totalAmount) AS yaxis FROM sys_project p LEFT JOIN sys_customer c ON p.customer_id=c.customer_id WHERE p.deal_flag=1 AND YEAR(p.create_time) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY p.customer_id ORDER BY yaxis DESC

SELECT u.operational_indicator AS xaxis,IFNULL(SUM(totalAmount),0) AS yaxis FROM sys_project p RIGHT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id=p.pm_user_id WHERE p.pm_user_id= 103 AND DATE_FORMAT(p.create_time, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m') AND p.deal_flag=1
